participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Calm and introspective. Lila often reflects on her thoughts and experiences, valuing inner peace.
participant_1.background: i live in alaska. i'm a buddhist. i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i like meditation.

participant_2.name: Marcus
participant_2.personality: Rebellious and troubled. Marcus struggles with his choices but is longing for change.
participant_2.background: i'm here for shoplifting. i feel old. i'm currently in a juvenile detention center. i will be released in about a month. my mom is coming to visit me tomorrow.
